definition: Tiglath-Pileser or Tilgath-pilneser, an Assyryrian king

translations.da: Tiglath-Pileser eller Tilgath-pilneser, en assyrisk konge
translations.de: Tiglath-Pileser oder Tilgath-Pilneser, ein assyrischer König
translations.el: Τίγλαθ-Πιλεσέρ ή Τιλγκαθ-Πιλεσέρ, βασιλιάς της Ασσυρίας
translations.id: Tiglath-Pileser atau Tilgath-pilneser, seorang raja Asyur
translations.ja: ティグラト＝ピレセルまたはティルガト＝ピルネセル、アッシリア王
translations.nb: Tiglath-Pileser eller Tilgath-Pilneser, en assyrisk konge
translations.nl: Tiglath-Pileser of Tilgath-pilneser, een Assyrische koning
translations.ro: Tiglath-Pileser sau Tilgath-pilneser, un rege asirian
translations.sv: Tiglath-Pileser eller Tilgath-pilneser, en assyrisk kung
translations.tr: Tiglath-Pileser ya da Tilgath-pilneser, bir Asur kralı
